item.description: strict strictæ–‡æ¡£ true false The strict flag enables a wide range of type checking behavior that results in stronger guarantees of program correctness. Turning this on is equivalent to enabling all of the strict mode family options, which are outlined below. You can then turn off individual strict mode family checks as needed. Future versions of TypeScript may introduce additional stricter checking under
